imos
Class Imos

java.lang.Object
  imos.Imos
All Implemented Interfaces:
IImos
public class Imos
extends java.lang.Object
implements IImos

The Intrinsically Motivated Schema mechanism.

Author:
ogeorgeon

Field Summary
 int ACTIVATION_THRESH
          Default Activation threshold (The weight threshold for higher-level learning with the second learning mechanism).
static boolean DETERMINISTIC
          If true then the IMOS does not use random
static int HYPOTHETICAL
          Hypothetical act (Cannot be chosen as an intention, cannot support higher-level learning).
 int REG_SENS_THRESH
          Default regularity sensibility threshold (The weight threshold for an act to become reliable).
static int RELIABLE
          Reliable act (Can be chosen as an intention and can support higher-level learning).
 int SCHEMA_MAX_LENGTH
          Default maximum length of a schema (For the schema to be chosen as an intention)

Constructor Detail

Imos

public Imos()
Constructor for the Intrinsic Motivation system. Use default parameters REG_SENS_THRESH and SCHEMA_MAX_LENGTH.

Imos

public Imos(int regularitySensibilityThreshold)
Constructor for the Intrinsic Motivation system.

Parameters:
regularitySensibilityThreshold - The regularity sensibility threshold. A lower value favors the faster adoption of possibly less satisfying sequences, a higher value favors the slower adoption of possibly more satisfying sequences.

addInteraction

public IAct addInteraction(java.lang.String moveLabel,
                           java.lang.String effectLabel,
                           int satisfaction)
Construct a new interaction or retrieve the interaction if it already exists. The interaction's action is recorded as a primitive schema.

Specified by:
addInteraction in interface IImos
Parameters:
moveLabel - The label of the interaction's action in the environment.
effectLabel - The label of the interaction's stimuli generated by the action.
satisfaction - The interaction's satisfaction (only needed in case this interaction was not yet declared in imos).
Returns:
The act that was created or that already existed.

track

public void track(IEnaction enaction)
Track the current enaction. Use the intended primitive act and the effect. Generates the enacted primitive act, the top enacted act, and the top remaining act.

Specified by:
track in interface IImos
Parameters:
enaction - The current enaction.

terminate

public void terminate(IEnaction enaction)
Terminate the current enaction. Use the top intended act, the top enacted Act, the previous learning context, and the initial learning context. Generates the final activation context and the final learning context. Record or reinforce the learned acts and schemes.

Specified by:
terminate in interface IImos
Parameters:
enaction - The current enaction.
